bhinna_ashtakavarga.description: 7 Individual Planet Charts (Bindu strength by house)

sarvashtakavarga.description: Combined Ashtakavarga (Total strength across all planets)

all_yogas.name: vesi_yoga
all_yogas.title: Vesai Yoga
all_yogas.description: There is a planet other than Moon in the 2nd house from Sun
all_yogas.effect: You will have a balanced outlook. You are truthful, tall and sluggish. You will be happy and comfortable even with little wealth.

all_yogas.name: vosi_yoga
all_yogas.title: Vosi Yoga
all_yogas.description: There is a planet other than Moon in the 12th house from Sun
all_yogas.effect: You will be skillful, charitable, famous, learned and strong.

all_yogas.name: ubhayachara_yoga
all_yogas.title: Ubhayachara Yoga
all_yogas.description: There are planets other than Moon in the 2nd and 12th houses from Sun
all_yogas.effect: You will have all comforts. You will be like a king or an equal

all_yogas.name: sunaphaa_yoga
all_yogas.title: Sunaphaa Yoga
all_yogas.description: There are planets other than Sun in the 2nd house from Moon
all_yogas.effect: You will become a king or an equal. You are intelligent, wealthy and famous. You will have self-earned wealth.

all_yogas.name: anaphaa_yoga
all_yogas.title: Anaphaa Yoga
all_yogas.description: There are planets other than Sun in the 12th house from Moon
all_yogas.effect: You will become a king with good looks. Your body is likely free from disease. You are a person of character and have great reputation. You are surrounded by comforts.

all_yogas.name: duradhara_yoga
all_yogas.title: Duradhara Yoga
all_yogas.description: There are planets other than Sun in the 2nd and 12th houses from Moon.
all_yogas.effect: You will enjoy many pleasures. You are charitable. You will wealth and vehicles. You will have good servants.

all_yogas.name: paasa_yoga
all_yogas.title: Paasa Yoga
all_yogas.description: The seven planets occupy exactly 5 distinct signs among them.
all_yogas.effect: One born with this yoga has the risk of being imprisoned. This person is capable in their work. This person is talkataive. This person has many servants. This person lacks character. Paasa means a noose.

all_yogas.name: subha_yoga
all_yogas.title: Subha Yoga
all_yogas.description: Lagna has benefics or has “subha kartari – benefics in 12th and 2nd house from Lagna.
all_yogas.effect: One born with this yoga has eloquence, good looks and character

all_yogas.name: asubha_yoga
all_yogas.title: Asubha Yoga
all_yogas.description: Lagna has malefics or has “paapa kartari or maleefics in 12th and 2nd house from Lagna.
all_yogas.effect: One born with this yoga has many desires and is sinful and enjoys the wealth of others.

all_yogas.name: bhaarathi_yoga
all_yogas.title: Bhaarathi Yoga
all_yogas.description: If the lord of the sign occupied in navamsa by 2nd, 5th or 11th lord exalted and joins the 9th lord, then this yoga is present.
all_yogas.effect: One born with this yoga is a great scholar. Person is intelligent, religious, good-looking and famous. Bhaarathi is another name of Saraswathi, the goddess of learning.

all_yogas.name: vasumati_yoga
all_yogas.title: Vasumati Yoga
all_yogas.description: If benefics occupy upachayas, then this yoga is present.
all_yogas.effect: For it to give full results, malefics should not occupy upachayas and the benefics occupying upachayas should be strong. One born with this yoga has abundant wealth. Vasumati means earth.

all_yogas.name: adhi_yoga
all_yogas.title: Adhi Yoga
all_yogas.description: Natural benefics occupy 6th, 7th and 8th from Moon
all_yogas.effect: You may become a king or a minister or an army chief, depending on the strength of the planets involved

all_yogas.name: amala_yoga
all_yogas.title: Amala Yoga
all_yogas.description: There are only natural benefics present in the 10th house from lagna or Moon.
all_yogas.effect: One born with this yoga has ever-lasting fame. The person is respected by kings. Person has luxuries and is virtuous. Person helps others. Amala means pure. Because the 10th house shows one's' conduct in society, situation of only benefics there makes one’s conduct in the society very pure.

all_yogas.name: kaahala_yoga
all_yogas.title: Kaahala Yoga
all_yogas.description: If (1) the 4th lord and Jupiter32 are in mutual quadrants and (2) lagna lord is strong, then this yoga is present. Alternately, this yoga is present if the 4th lord is exalted or in own sign and the 10th lord joins him.
all_yogas.effect: One born with this yoga is strong, bold, cunning and leads a large army. Person owns a few villages. Kaahala means excessive. It also means mischievous.

all_yogas.name: bheri_yoga
all_yogas.title: Bheri Yoga
all_yogas.description: ]If (1) the 9th lord is strong and (2) 1st, 2nd, 7th and 12th houses are occupied by planets, then this yoga is present. Alternately, this is yoga is present if (1) the 9th lord is strong and (2) Jupiter, Venus and lagna lord are in mutual quadrants.
all_yogas.effect: One born with this yoga is blessed with wealth, spouse and children. Person can be a king. Person has fame and character. Person is virtuous and religious. Person enjoys pleasures. Bheri means a kettledrum.

all_yogas.name: matsya_yoga
all_yogas.title: Matsya Yoga
all_yogas.description: If (1) benefics are in lagna and 9th, (2) some planets are in 5th, and, (3) malefics are in chaturasras (4th and 8th houses), then this yoga is present.
all_yogas.effect: One born with this yoga becomes an astrologer or a seer. Person is a personification of kindness, character and intelligence. Person is strong and good-looking. Person is famous and learned. Person is a tapasvi (austere pursuer). Matsya means a fish.

all_yogas.name: hari_yoga
all_yogas.title: Hari Yoga
all_yogas.description: If benefics occupy the 2nd, 12th and 8th houses counted from the 2nd lord, then this yoga is present.
all_yogas.effect: One born with this yoga is happy, learned and blessed with wealth and children. Hari is a name of Lord Vishnu. The 2nd house is the house of food and money and it is a trine from karma sthana – the 10th house. It stands for sustenance and its lord represents Hari – Sustainer of Hindu Trinity – in a chart.

all_yogas.name: trilochana_yoga
all_yogas.title: Trilochana Yoga
all_yogas.description: If Sun, Moon and Mars are in mutual trines, then this yoga is present.
all_yogas.effect: One born with this yoga is wealthy, intelligent, long-lived and victorious over enemies. Person achieves everything without many obstacles. Trilochana means 'one with three eyes'. It is another name of Lord Siva, who has a hidden eye in His forehead.

all_yogas.name: sarpa_yoga
all_yogas.title: Sarpa Yoga
all_yogas.description: Three quadrants are occupied by natural malefic planets.
all_yogas.effect: One born with this yoga is miserable, unhappy, cruel, poor and dependent on others for food. This is a very bad combination.

all_yogas.name: koota_yoga
all_yogas.title: Koota Yoga
all_yogas.description: All the planets occupy the 7 signs from the 4th house.
all_yogas.effect: One born with this yoga becomes a jailer. The person is a liar. The person lives in hills and forts. The person is poor and cruel. Koota means a group. It has several other meanings.

all_yogas.name: ardha_chandra_yoga
all_yogas.title: Ardha Chandra Yoga
all_yogas.description: All the planets occupy the 7 signs starting from a panapara or an apoklima.
all_yogas.effect: One born with this yoga becomes an army chief. This person has a good physique. Kings like this person. This person is strong and possesses gems, gold and many ornaments. Ardha Chandra means half-Moon.

all_yogas.name: daama_yoga
all_yogas.title: Daama Yoga
all_yogas.description: The seven planets occupy exactly 6 distinct signs among them.
all_yogas.effect: One born with this yoga is very rich and famous. This person has many children. This person has many gems. This person helps others. Daama means a wreath. Some authors call this Daamini yoga.

all_yogas.name: veenaa_yoga
all_yogas.title: Veenaa Yoga
all_yogas.description: The seven planets occupy exactly 7 distinct signs among them.
all_yogas.effect: One born with this yoga likes music, dance and songs. This person has many servants. This person is wealthy, skillful and a leader of men. Veenaa is a stringed musical instrument. This is also called Vallaki yoga by some authors.

all_yogas.name: sankha_yoga
all_yogas.title: Sankha Yoga
all_yogas.description: If (1) lagna lord is strong and (2) 5th and 6th lords are in mutual quadrants, then this yoga is present. Alternately, this yoga is present if (1) lagna lord and 10th lord are together in a movable sign and (2) the 9th lord is strong.
all_yogas.effect: One born with this yoga is blessed with wealth, spouse and children. He is kind, pious, intelligent and long-lived. Sankha means a conch shell.

all_yogas.name: mridanga_yoga
all_yogas.title: Mridanga Yoga
all_yogas.description: If (1) there are planets in own and exaltation signs in quadrants and trines and (2) lagna lord is strong, then this yoga is present.
all_yogas.effect: One born with this yoga is a king or an equal and is happy. Mridanga is a rich and elegant percussion instrument popular in south India.

all_yogas.name: harsha_yoga
all_yogas.title: Harsha Yoga
all_yogas.description: If the 6th lord occupies the 6th house, then this yoga is present.
all_yogas.effect: One born with this yoga is happy, strong, good-natured and invincible. Harsha means joyous.

all_yogas.name: sreenaatha_yoga
all_yogas.title: Sreenaatha Yoga
all_yogas.description: If (1) the 7th lord is exalted in 10th and (2) 10th lord is with 9th lord, then this yoga is present.
all_yogas.effect: One born with this yoga becomes a great king equal to Indra – king of gods. Sreenaatha means the lord of great wealth and prosperity. It also means Vishnu.

all_yogas.name: brahma_yoga
all_yogas.title: Brahma Yoga
all_yogas.description: If benefics occupy the 4th, 10th and 11th houses counted from lagna lord, then this yoga is present. Another variation of Brahma yoga: If (1) Jupiter is in a quadrant from the 9th lord, (2) Venus is in a quadrant from the 11th lord, and, (3) Mercury is in a quadrant from the 1st lord or 10th lord, then this yoga is present.
all_yogas.effect: One born with this yoga is happy, learned and blessed with wealth and children. Brahma is the creator of this universe. Lagna rules birth and the Creator is represented in a chart by lagna lord.

all_yogas.name: hamsa_yoga
all_yogas.title: Hamsa Yoga
all_yogas.description: Jupiter should be in Sagitarius, Pisces or Capricornn and he should be in 1st, 4th, 7th or 10th from lagna.
all_yogas.effect: You are a great man of ethery nature. You are swan-like. You have spiritual strength and purity. You are respected by everyone. You are very passionate. You may become a king. You may have all comforts. You enjoy life fully. You are a clever conversationalist and endowed with good speech.

all_yogas.name: maalaa_yoga
all_yogas.title: Maalaa Yoga
all_yogas.description: Three quadrants are occupied by natural benefics.
all_yogas.effect: You will be always happy. You will have nice clothes, vehicles, luxuries and friendship of many women.

all_yogas.name: vajra_yoga
all_yogas.title: Vajra Yoga
all_yogas.description: Lagna and the 7th houses are occupied by natural benefic planet and the 4th and 10th houses are occupied by natural malefic planets.
all_yogas.effect: One born with this yoga is happy in the early and late parts of life. This person has valour. This person is not fortunate, but has no desires either. This person fights. Vajra means a diamond.

all_yogas.name: guru_mangala_yoga
all_yogas.title: guru_mangala_yoga
all_yogas.description: If Jupiter and Mars are together or in the 7th house from each other, then this yoga is present.
all_yogas.effect: One born with this yoga is righteous and energetic. The person's 'energies are channelled in dharmic paths.

all_yogas.name: parvata_yoga
all_yogas.title: Parvata Yoga
all_yogas.description: If (1) quadrants are occupied only by benefics and (2) the 7th and 8th houses are either vacant or occupied only by benefics
all_yogas.effect: One born with this yoga is fortunate, eloquent, famous, charitable, easy-going and likes humour. Parvata means a mountain.

all_yogas.name: kemadruma_yoga
all_yogas.title: Kemadruma Yoga
all_yogas.description: There are no planets other than Sun in the 1st, 2nd and 12th houses from Moon and there are no planets other than Moon in the quadrants from lagna
all_yogas.effect: You are unlucky, bereft of intelligence and learning and afflicted by poverty and trouble. This bad yoga kills the results of other good yogas in the chart, especially Chandra yogas (if any). You have to work hard and succeed through great efforts.

all_yogas.name: chandra_mangala_yoga
all_yogas.title: Chandra Mangala Yoga
all_yogas.description: Moon and Mars are together (in one sign).
all_yogas.effect: You are worldly wise and materially successful. You may earn money through unscrupulous means. You may treat mother or other women badly.

all_yogas.name: ruchaka_yoga
all_yogas.title: Ruchaka Yoga
all_yogas.description: Mars is in a quadrant in own sign or exaltation sign.
all_yogas.effect: You are a person of fiery nature. You have a lot of enthusiasm. You are a natural leader. You love to fight wars and you will be victorious over enemies. You are discriminative and a devotee of learned people. You are well-versed in occult sciences. You have good taste. You will be always successful.

all_yogas.name: go_yoga
all_yogas.title: Go Yoga
all_yogas.description: If (1) Jupiter is strong in his moolatrikona, (2) the lord of the 2nd house is with Jupiter, and, (3) lagna lord is exalted, then this yoga is present.
all_yogas.effect: One born with this yoga is from a respectable family. Person is wealthy and resepcted by all. Go means a cow.

all_yogas.name: koorma_yoga
all_yogas.title: Koorma Yoga
all_yogas.description: If (1) the 5th, 6th and 7th houses are occupied by benefics who are in own, exaltation or friendly signs and (2) the 1st, 3rd and 11th houses are occupied by malefics who are in own or exaltation signs, then this yoga is present.
all_yogas.effect: One born with this yoga becomes a king. Person has piety and character. Person is happy, helpful and famous. Koorma means a tortoise.

all_yogas.name: vimala_yoga
all_yogas.title: Vimala Yoga
all_yogas.description: If the 12th lord occupies the 12th house, then this yoga is present.
all_yogas.effect: One born with this yoga is noble, frugal, happy and independent. Vimala means pure.

present_doshas.name: Pitru Dosha
present_doshas.description: Pitru Dosha is a planetary flaw that means a karmic debt of the ancestors, which is to be paid by the person afflicted with Pitru Dosha in the Kundli. It is formed when your forefathers have committed any mistakes, crimes, or sins in their life journey. In return, you have to pay the karmic debt by experiencing different challenges or punishments in your life. This Dosha is created when Sun or Moon are in conjunction or aspects Rahu or Ketu in your birth chart. The malefic effects of this Dosha become severe when the conjunction takes place in the 1st, 5th, 8th, or 9th house of the birth chart. Hence, if you are facing never-ending troubles, Pitru Dosha may be the reason for the pain and agony in your life.  There is pitru dosha in this horoscope for the following reasons:Either sun, moon or Rahu is in ninth house.Ketu is in the fourth house.Either sun, moon, rahu or ketu has been afflicted by malefic planets like Mars or Saturn

present_doshas.name: Guru Chandala Dosha
present_doshas.description: There is Guru Chandal dosha in this horoscope. In the birth chart, Chandal Dosha occurs when the planet Jupiter is in conjunction with the malefic planets Rahu or Ketu. Jupiter is called Guru in Vedic Astrology. Chandal refers to an Asura, which is Rahu. Hence, the Dosha is also known as Guru Chandal Dosha. The Dosha can cause malefic effects in the native’s life. Alternatively, if Jupiter is strong, this will become Guru-Chandal-Yoga. However, this Dosha is not very malefic in all houses, and if Jupiter is stronger and well placed, and can control Rahu, then the native could go a long way with minimal loss. Jupiter combined with Ketu is not considered Chandal Dosha by astrologers in the Northern part of India. It makes the native more spiritual and isolated from the world.In your horoscope, Jupiter is stronger than Ketu. So it becomes Guru-Chandal-Yoga for you.Jupiter and Rahu or Ketu in the 11th house will give you a good social image, affection towards children but you will run after wealth all your life.

all_doshas.name: Kala Sarpa Dosha
all_doshas.description: There is no Kala Sarpa Dosha in this horoscope.

all_doshas.name: Manglik Dosha
all_doshas.description: There is no Manglik/Mars dosha in this horoscope.

all_doshas.name: Pitru Dosha
all_doshas.description: Pitru Dosha is a planetary flaw that means a karmic debt of the ancestors, which is to be paid by the person afflicted with Pitru Dosha in the Kundli. It is formed when your forefathers have committed any mistakes, crimes, or sins in their life journey. In return, you have to pay the karmic debt by experiencing different challenges or punishments in your life. This Dosha is created when Sun or Moon are in conjunction or aspects Rahu or Ketu in your birth chart. The malefic effects of this Dosha become severe when the conjunction takes place in the 1st, 5th, 8th, or 9th house of the birth chart. Hence, if you are facing never-ending troubles, Pitru Dosha may be the reason for the pain and agony in your life.  There is pitru dosha in this horoscope for the following reasons:Either sun, moon or Rahu is in ninth house.Ketu is in the fourth house.Either sun, moon, rahu or ketu has been afflicted by malefic planets like Mars or Saturn

all_doshas.name: Guru Chandala Dosha
all_doshas.description: There is Guru Chandal dosha in this horoscope. In the birth chart, Chandal Dosha occurs when the planet Jupiter is in conjunction with the malefic planets Rahu or Ketu. Jupiter is called Guru in Vedic Astrology. Chandal refers to an Asura, which is Rahu. Hence, the Dosha is also known as Guru Chandal Dosha. The Dosha can cause malefic effects in the native’s life. Alternatively, if Jupiter is strong, this will become Guru-Chandal-Yoga. However, this Dosha is not very malefic in all houses, and if Jupiter is stronger and well placed, and can control Rahu, then the native could go a long way with minimal loss. Jupiter combined with Ketu is not considered Chandal Dosha by astrologers in the Northern part of India. It makes the native more spiritual and isolated from the world.In your horoscope, Jupiter is stronger than Ketu. So it becomes Guru-Chandal-Yoga for you.Jupiter and Rahu or Ketu in the 11th house will give you a good social image, affection towards children but you will run after wealth all your life.

all_doshas.name: Ganda Moola Dosha
all_doshas.description: There is no ganda moola dosha in this horoscope.

all_doshas.name: Kalathra Dosha
all_doshas.description: There is no kalathra dosha in this horoscope.

all_doshas.name: Ghata Dosha
all_doshas.description: There is no ghata dosha in this horoscope.

all_doshas.name: Shrapit Dosha
all_doshas.description: There is no shrapit dosha in this horoscope
